faq.question: What is TechTerview?
faq.answer: TechTerview is a comprehensive interview preparation platform designed specifically for tech professionals. It combines mock interviews, coding challenges, AI-powered feedback, and personalized learning paths to help you ace your next tech interview and advance your career.

faq.question: Who created TechTerview?
faq.answer: TechTerview was founded by Francis (Co-Founder & CEO) and Kyle (Co-Founder & CTO), two visionary engineers passionate about revolutionizing tech interview preparation. Our team also includes Yuan (Head of Product), James (Lead Designer), and Kith (Senior Engineer) - a passionate group of engineers, designers, and educators dedicated to transforming tech careers.

faq.question: Tell me about the TechTerview team
faq.answer: Our team consists of five dedicated professionals: Francis, our visionary CEO focused on revolutionizing interview prep; Kyle, our technical CTO and AI specialist; Yuan, our product strategist creating exceptional user experiences; James, our creative lead designer; and Kith, our senior full-stack engineer ensuring platform reliability. Together, we're passionate about helping developers succeed in their tech careers.

faq.question: What's the background of TechTerview's founders?
faq.answer: Francis, our Co-Founder & CEO, is a visionary leader passionate about revolutionizing tech interview preparation and helping developers succeed. Kyle, our Co-Founder & CTO, is a technical architect and AI specialist driving innovation in interview preparation technology. Together, they combined their expertise to create a platform that addresses real challenges in technical interviews.

faq.question: Is TechTerview free?
faq.answer: TechTerview offers both free and premium tiers. Our free plan includes access to basic coding challenges and limited mock interviews. Premium subscribers get unlimited access to all features, including advanced AI feedback, personalized pathways, and exclusive content from industry experts.

faq.question: How does the AI feedback system work?
faq.answer: Our AI system analyzes your code in real-time, evaluating factors like algorithm efficiency, code quality, best practices, and problem-solving approach. It provides instant feedback and suggestions for improvement, helping you learn and adapt quickly. The AI also tracks your progress over time to personalize future recommendations.

faq.question: Who is TechTerview for?
faq.answer: TechTerview is perfect for software developers, engineers, data scientists, and other tech professionals at any career stage. Whether you're a recent graduate preparing for your first job, an experienced developer looking to switch companies, or someone aiming for senior positions at top tech companies, our platform adapts to your needs.

faq.question: How can I start using TechTerview?
faq.answer: Getting started is simple! Click the 'Sign Up' button to create your free account. Complete a brief assessment to help us understand your current skill level and goals, then choose your personalized learning pathway. You can immediately start practicing with coding challenges and schedule your first mock interview.

faq.question: What programming languages are supported?
faq.answer: TechTerview supports all major programming languages including Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, C#, Go, Rust, Swift, Kotlin, and more. Our platform automatically detects your preferred language and provides language-specific feedback and best practices.

faq.question: What types of mock interviews are available?
faq.answer: We offer various interview formats including technical coding interviews, system design sessions, behavioral interviews, and company-specific interview styles. You can practice with both AI-powered interviewers and live sessions with industry professionals from top tech companies.

faq.question: How do you track my progress?
faq.answer: TechTerview provides detailed analytics including your coding performance trends, interview scores, skill development over time, and areas for improvement. Our dashboard shows your readiness level for different companies and positions, helping you focus your preparation efforts effectively.
